text:
Dallas is discussing turning its convention center into a pop-up medical facility as the coronavirus overwhelms hospitals. 

Yet @GovAbbott is sticking with reopening - on Friday reopened amusement parks - and doing nothing to stop the spread. 

Pray for the people of Texas. 🇺🇸
